statements: UPDATE fingerprint_templates SET user_id = 1, fingerprint_template = E'\xDEADBEEF' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE fingerprint_templates SET fingerprint_template = E'\xCAFE1234', created_at = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE fingerprint_templates SET user_id = 2, created_at = NOW() WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE fingerprint_templates SET fingerprint_template = 'new_fingerprint' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE fingerprint_templates SET user_id = 1, fingerprint_template = '\x4D' WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE fingerprint_templates SET fingerprint_data = '0101010101' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', last_login = '2022-05-20 15:30:00' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE users SET last_login = current_timestamp WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE fingerprint_templates SET fingerprint_data = '\\x0123456789ABCDEF' WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE fingerprints SET fingerprint_data = 'new fingerprint data' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE fingerprints SET fingerprint_data = 'new_fingerprint_data' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE users SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE FingerprintTemplates SET template_data = '\x45415645434F4E534944454E542042594541' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Users SET password = 'newpassword123' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE FingerprintTemplates SET template_data = '\x5566778899AA' WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 3;
UPDATE Users SET password = 'newPassword123' WHERE id = 5 AND username = 'john_doe';
